discussion.content:
C. Add an entitlement template to the product for phone support.

To automatically provide phone support to customers who purchase a specific software product, the administrator should add an entitlement template to that product. An entitlement template is a collection of settings that determine the terms and service level of the entitlement. The entitlement template can be configured to include phone support for the specific product, and it will automatically apply to any customer who purchases that product. This will ensure that the customer receives the phone support they are entitled to, without the need for any additional manual steps.

questions.question_text:
Ursa Major Solar (UMS) wants to improve its customers' ability to search for knowledge articles. UMS has already created categories for articles.

Which two additional changes should be made to improve search capabilities? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: B and D should be the answer.

A. Promote specific search terms for specific articles.
B. Create synonyms for specific search terms.

To improve search capabilities for knowledge articles, UMS should promote specific search terms for specific articles and create synonyms for specific search terms. This will help users find the right articles more easily by providing alternative search terms that may be more familiar or common. Configuring Global Search or Einstein Search may also be helpful, but promoting search terms and creating synonyms are more direct ways to improve search capabilities for knowledge articles.

choices.B: Create synonyms for specific search terms.
choices.A: Promote specific search terms for specific articles.
